discussion.p: `shared_ptr` owns a pointer (or `nullptr_t`), not the pointee, but SCHED wants the pointee.
discussion.note: Kona 2025-11-05; approved by LWG. Status changed: New → Immediate.

blockquote.p: -1- `task_scheduler` is a class that models `scheduler` (). Given an object `s` of type `task_scheduler`, let SCHED be the object pointed to by the pointer owned by `s.sch_`.
